title: Himi 637
lyrics:
M.N.N.
(“Manatu ‘a e ‘aho Sapate ke tauhi
ia ke tapu.” - ‘Ekisoto 20:8)
1.
‘Ē, ‘ē, si’i ‘aho ia
Ne tuʻutuʻuni muʻa
Ko e taha ‘i he fitu pē,
Kae tapu maʻa e ‘Otua.
2.
ʻĀ, ko e toki ‘Aho!
Ko e faingamālie ē
Ke tokonaki me’a topono
Maʻa hotau laumālie.
3.
Ko e ‘Aho mālōlō
Ke tau mālōlō mu’a,
‘O fakangalo mei he loto
Ngāue ‘aho-ngofua.
4.
Ko e ‘Aho fakanonga
‘A e loto e hoha’a,
‘Eiki, fai mai Haʻo Folofola,
Kae nonga ai pē ā.
5.
Ko e ‘Aho fakamaama
‘A e loto po’ulia
Ke ulo, ‘Eiki, Ho Sikaina
‘O fakamaamangia.
6.
Ko e ‘Aho fai ‘a e hū-
‘Eiki, tau fefiohi;
Ka mau ka ‘i Ho ‘A
o
lonuku,
‘Ē! Hifo tāpuaki.
7.
‘Oiau, he monū’ia
‘O e ‘Aho Tapu heni!
Kae huanoa ka mau a’usia
‘A e Sāpate ‘o Langi. *
J.E.M. Jnr.
